headline: Oil Prices Get Short-Lived Jolt From Latest Trump Tariff Threat
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Oil futures got a short-lived jolt Thursday after President Donald Trump reiterated plans to impose 25% tariffs on imports from major crude suppliers Canada and Mexico. headline: Valero Energy Q4 Earnings Beat Expectations Despite Refining Woes: Details
summary: Valero Energy Corporation (NYSE:VLO) reported a fourth-quarter sales decline of 13.2% year-on-year to $30.76 billion, beating the analyst consensus estimate of $30.20 billion. The Refining segment posted an operating income of $437 million, down from $1.6 billion in the prior year quarter. During this quarter, refining throughput averaged 3 million barrels per day. Operating income from the Ethanol segment stood at $20 million, down from $190 million in the fourth quarter of 2023. Production vol
